info.title: Schema of MediaServices events published to Azure Event Grid
info.description: Describes the schema of the MediaServices events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

MediaJobCanceledEventData.description: Job canceled event data. Schema of the data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.JobCanceled event.

MediaJobCancelingEventData.description: Job canceling event data. Schema of the data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.JobCanceling event.

message.description: A human-readable language-dependent representation of the error.

retry.description: Indicates that it may be possible to retry the Job. If retry is unsuccessful, please contact Azure support via Azure Portal.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

values.name: Service
values.description: The error is service related.

values.name: Download
values.description: The error is download related.

values.name: Upload
values.description: The error is upload related.

values.name: Configuration
values.description: The error is configuration related.

values.name: Content
values.description: The error is related to data in the input files.

values.name: Account
values.description: The error is related to account information.

values.name: ServiceError
values.description: Fatal service error, please contact support.

values.name: ServiceTransientError
values.description: Transient error, please retry, if retry is unsuccessful, please contact support.

values.name: DownloadNotAccessible
values.description: While trying to download the input files, the files were not accessible, please check the availability of the source.

values.name: DownloadTransientError
values.description: While trying to download the input files, there was an issue during transfer (storage service, network errors), see details and check your source.

values.name: UploadNotAccessible
values.description: While trying to upload the output files, the destination was not reachable, please check the availability of the destination.

values.name: UploadTransientError
values.description: While trying to upload the output files, there was an issue during transfer (storage service, network errors), see details and check your destination.

values.name: ConfigurationUnsupported
values.description: There was a problem with the combination of input files and the configuration settings applied, fix the configuration settings and retry with the same input, or change input to match the configuration.

values.name: ContentMalformed
values.description: There was a problem with the input content (for example: zero byte files, or corrupt/non-decodable files), check the input files.

values.name: ContentUnsupported
values.description: There was a problem with the format of the input (not valid media file, or an unsupported file/codec), check the validity of the input files.

values.name: IdentityUnsupported
values.description: There is an error verifying to the account identity. Check and fix the identity configurations and retry. If unsuccessful, please contact support.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

MediaJobErroredEventData.description: Job error state event data. Schema of the data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.JobErrored event.

MediaJobFinishedEventData.description: Job finished event data. Schema of the data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.JobFinished event.

MediaJobOutput.description: The event data for a Job output.

assetName.description: Gets the Job output asset name.

MediaJobOutputAsset.description: The event data for a Job output asset.

MediaJobOutputCanceledEventData.description: Job output canceled event data. Schema of the data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.JobOutputCanceled event.

MediaJobOutputCancelingEventData.description: Job output canceling event data. Schema of the data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.JobOutputCanceling event.

MediaJobOutputErroredEventData.description: Job output error event data. Schema of the data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.JobOutputErrored event.

MediaJobOutputFinishedEventData.description: Job output finished event data. Schema of the data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.JobOutputFinished event.

MediaJobOutputProcessingEventData.description: Job output processing event data. Schema of the data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.JobOutputProcessing event.

MediaJobOutputProgressEventData.description: Job Output Progress Event Data. Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.JobOutputProgress event.

MediaJobOutputScheduledEventData.description: Job output scheduled event data. Schema of the data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.JobOutputScheduled event.

previousState.description: The previous state of the Job.

MediaJobOutputStateChangeEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.JobOutputStateChange event.

MediaJobProcessingEventData.description: Job processing event data. Schema of the data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.JobProcessing event.

values.name: DoNotRetry
values.description: Issue needs to be investigated and then the job resubmitted with corrections or retried once the underlying issue has been corrected.

values.name: MayRetry
values.description: Issue may be resolved after waiting for a period of time and resubmitting the same Job.

MediaJobScheduledEventData.description: Job scheduled event data. Schema of the data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.JobScheduled event.

values.name: Canceled
values.description: The job was canceled. This is a final state for the job.

values.name: Canceling
values.description: The job is in the process of being canceled. This is a transient state for the job.

values.name: Error
values.description: The job has encountered an error. This is a final state for the job.

values.name: Finished
values.description: The job is finished. This is a final state for the job.

values.name: Processing
values.description: The job is processing. This is a transient state for the job.

values.name: Queued
values.description: The job is in a queued state, waiting for resources to become available. This is a transient state.

values.name: Scheduled
values.description: The job is being scheduled to run on an available resource. This is a transient state, between queued and processing states.

previousState.description: The previous state of the Job.

state.description: The new state of the Job.

MediaJobStateChangeEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.JobStateChange event.

channelLatencyMs.description: Gets the channel latency in ms.

MediaLiveEventChannelArchiveHeartbeatEve.description: Channel Archive heartbeat event data. Schema of the data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.LiveEventChannelArchiveHeartbeat event.

ingestUrl.description: Gets the ingest URL provided by the live event.

MediaLiveEventConnectionRejectedEventDat.description: Encoder connection rejected event data. Schema of the data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.LiveEventConnectionRejected event.

ingestUrl.description: Gets the ingest URL provided by the live event.

MediaLiveEventEncoderConnectedEventData.description: Encoder connect event data. Schema of the data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.LiveEventEncoderConnected event.

ingestUrl.description: Gets the ingest URL provided by the live event.

MediaLiveEventEncoderDisconnectedEventDa.description: Encoder disconnected event data. Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.LiveEventEncoderDisconnected event.

timestamp.description: Gets the timestamp of the data chunk dropped.

trackType.description: Gets the type of the track (Audio / Video).

bitrate.description: Gets the bitrate of the track.

timescale.description: Gets the timescale of the Timestamp.

resultCode.description: Gets the result code for fragment drop operation.

trackName.description: Gets the name of the track for which fragment is dropped.

MediaLiveEventIncomingDataChunkDroppedEv.description: Ingest fragment dropped event data. Schema of the data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.LiveEventIncomingDataChunkDropped event.

ingestUrl.description: Gets the ingest URL provided by the live event.

trackType.description: Gets the type of the track (Audio / Video).

bitrate.description: Gets the bitrate of the track.

timestamp.description: Gets the first timestamp of the data chunk received.

duration.description: Gets the duration of the first data chunk.

timescale.description: Gets the timescale in which timestamp is represented.

MediaLiveEventIncomingStreamReceivedEven.description: Encoder connect event data. Schema of the data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.LiveEventIncomingStreamReceived event.

minLastTimestamp.description: Gets the minimum last timestamp received.

typeOfStreamWithMinLastTimestamp.description: Gets the type of stream with minimum last timestamp.

maxLastTimestamp.description: Gets the maximum timestamp among all the tracks (audio or video).

typeOfStreamWithMaxLastTimestamp.description: Gets the type of stream with maximum last timestamp.

timescaleOfMinLastTimestamp.description: Gets the timescale in which "MinLastTimestamp" is represented.

timescaleOfMaxLastTimestamp.description: Gets the timescale in which "MaxLastTimestamp" is represented.

MediaLiveEventIncomingStreamsOutOfSyncEv.description: Incoming streams out of sync event data. Schema of the data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.LiveEventIncomingStreamsOutOfSync event.

firstTimestamp.description: Gets the first timestamp received for one of the quality levels.

firstDuration.description: Gets the duration of the data chunk with first timestamp.

secondTimestamp.description: Gets the timestamp received for some other quality levels.

secondDuration.description: Gets the duration of the data chunk with second timestamp.

timescale.description: Gets the timescale in which both the timestamps and durations are represented.

MediaLiveEventIncomingVideoStreamsOutOfS.description: Incoming video stream out of sync event data. Schema of the data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.LiveEventIncomingVideoStreamsOutOfSync event.

trackType.description: Gets the type of the track (Audio / Video).

bitrate.description: Gets the bitrate of the track.

ingestDriftValue.description: Gets the track ingest drift value.

lastFragmentArrivalTime.description: Gets the arrival UTC time of the last fragment.

timescale.description: Gets the timescale of the last timestamp.

unexpectedBitrate.description: Gets a value indicating whether unexpected bitrate is present or not.

state.description: Gets the state of the live event.

healthy.description: Gets a value indicating whether preview is healthy or not.

MediaLiveEventIngestHeartbeatEventData.description: Ingest heartbeat event data. Schema of the data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.LiveEventIngestHeartbeat event.

trackType.description: Gets the type of the track (Audio / Video).

previousTimestamp.description: Gets the timestamp of the previous fragment.

newTimestamp.description: Gets the timestamp of the current fragment.

timescale.description: Gets the timescale in which both timestamps and discontinuity gap are represented.

discontinuityGap.description: Gets the discontinuity gap between PreviousTimestamp and NewTimestamp.

MediaLiveEventTrackDiscontinuityDetected.description: Ingest track discontinuity detected event data. Schema of the data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Media.LiveEventTrackDiscontinuityDetected event.
